examples.example: 我家附近的药店总是热情地为顾客提供专业的服务和建议。

translate.english: The pharmacy near my home always enthusiastically provides professional services and advice to customers.

examples.example: 我路过药店时，里面的工作人员微笑着向我打招呼。

translate.english: When I passed by the pharmacy, the staff inside smiled and greeted me.

examples.example: 我身体不舒服时，会去药店咨询专业的药剂师。

translate.english: When I don't feel well, I will go to the pharmacy to consult a professional pharmacist.
